response.overview: Ouat Media presents the best animated short films from the world's most talented young filmmakers and animators: Titles: - A LA FRANCAISE by Morrigane Boyer, Julien Hazebroucq, Ren Hsien Hsu, Emmanuelle Leleu and William Lorto - A SINGLE LIFE by Job, Joris and Marieke - BEAST by Cyril Bossmann, Pauline Menigot, Manon Grabette, Karim Hafa and Hadrien Ottevaere - CARGO CULT by Bastien Dubois- FOREVER MIME by Michael Visser- RUN ZOOM RUN by Jon Ireland - COSMIC LOVE by Corentin Charron, Lise Corriol, Manon Marsal, Simon Popot and Aurelien Revelli - HOME SWEET HOME by Pierre Clenet, Alejandro Diaz, Romain Mazenet and St√©phane Paccolat
response.title: 8 Animazing Shorts
